content: KCM-PD Kwik Cast cast-in-place anchor Ultimate-performance multi-thread, cast-in-place threaded inserts for concrete on metal pan deck with approvals ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Cast-in anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Application-relevant multi-thread configurations Anchor without nails for fastening to pan deck Wider base allows for easier fastening to pan deck Perforated foam protects inner threads from concrete intrusion Applications Pre-installed fastening points for suspending pipes, electrical conduits, cable trays, HVAC ducts and equipment, medical equipment and other overhead elements Pre-installed fastening points for seismic bracing applications For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual), ICC-ES report (concrete), Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Technical Data | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual), ICC-ES report (concrete), Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Seismic loading | Yes | Anchor type | Single-point, Cast-in | Head configuration | Internally threaded | Material composition | Carbon steel, Zinc-plated | PROFIS Software | No ### ITEMS- 2198100 - Kwik Cast KCM-PD 1/4,3/8 green-G - Package Size 250 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCM-PD 1/4,3/8 Cast-in anchor assy - 2198101 - Kwik Cast KCM-PD 3/8,1/2,5/8 red-R - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCM-PD 3/8,1/2,5/8 Cast-in anchor assy - 2198102 - Kwik Cast KCM-PD 3/8,1/2,5/8,3/4 grey-O - Package Size 25 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCM-PD 3/8,1/2,5/8,3/4 Cast-in anchor assy
